She recognized the Millenium puzzle, the relic Yugi was always wearing around his neck.
Around it, there were the other 6 objects, the Eye, the Ring (that she saw once in Bakura's hands), the Rod, the Scale, the Key and the Necklace (which she knew Ishizu Ishtar had owned).

Rebecca, like many, had always wonder how such thing could exist.
Magic was a real thing in this world, it couldn't be denied to whoever knew these items weren't just some old religious artifacts.
But this fact always puzzled the little blond-haired girl's mind.

How far could Magic goes ? Was it only about those specific Millenium items ? Were some powerful magics sleeping somewhere that could bend the reality itself ?
Reasonably, she thought, if Magic was real, it might had expressed itself on other occasions in History and on other place.

"Hi Rebecca", he responded quietly, then looking back at the photo.

"So you're interested in the Millenium items ?", he then said.
"Who wouldn't ?", answered Rebecca, "I was wondering what could do Magic... you know... Are those items unique, or are they other items or things like these in our planet ?"

"You mean, like... other Millenium items ?", Bakura asked.
- Yes.
- Well ... , Bakura paused seemingly lost in his thoughts, ... You know, not many people know about those 7 items. And even less know that they weren't exactly 7 but, in fact, 8 ...

"It's called the Millenium Heart. It's a very powerful item that was build with the same process of the 7 others, right after them."

Bakura paused again, remembering the story the evil spirit inside him told him.

"Nearly everybody in the village this day... Nearly, as there was 2 survivors. One of them was a commoner who wasn't in the village when the slaughter took place.
